title: The Wooden horse
creator_credit: London Film Productions, Wessex Films, Ian Dalrymple and Jack Lee
brief_description: Based on the novel “The Wooden Horse” by Eric Williams. This is a classic wartime escape film which will not fail to enthrall. Many attempts were made to escape Nazi prison camps and a band of British officers planned a daring, ingenious escape from the notorious Stalag Luft III. Tunnelling under an exercise horse, they fought a dangerous battle to survive. Starring Leo Genn, David Tomlinson and Anthony Steel.
